column3: great steak house. We sat at the bar and they have anything from beer
column5: as a matter of fact the cocktail I like they didn't have it on the list but the bar tender did not hesitated in finding out the recepie and made it for me
column6: came out great!. ThenHostess was very accommodating by giving us the option of dining upstairs or downstairs with a smile and welcoming manner. Our server Sarah was very knowlegable about the menu and very professional. We ordered several things on the menu and the food was terrific!
